{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = GL.iNet GL-SF1200 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wireless Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-sf1200/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GL.iNet |model = SF1200 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Meet) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = 2AFIW-SF1200 |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = SiFlower<!-- MIPS 2C4T (SiChang) -->;SF19A2890; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 2C4T |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- up to 1.0GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = cFeon;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;MT47H64M16NF-25E:M;D9RZH, DDR2, 1Gb, FBGA 84-ball; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Intel (Lantiq);PEB7084;PEB 7084 M, V1.2, PEB7084MV12, GSW150 (SLLW4); |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E4:95:6E |oui = E4:95:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO |addchip = <!-- 2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4200;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4550;;2; --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/02/2021 |estreldate = 10/2021 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09J8GKMRY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|GL.iNet}}
===Specification=== *CPU: SF19A2890 @1.0GHz (Dual-Core MIPS) <!-- SiFlower (SiChang) --> *Memory/Storage: 128MB (DDR2)/16MB (NOR) *Wi-Fi protocol: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) AC1200 :Speed: 300Mbps (2.4GHz), 867Mbps (5GHz) *Antennas: 4x external antennas *Ethernet Ports: 4x 10/100/1000Mbps *Dimension: 210 x 145 x 28 mm
==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/how-do-gl-inet-devices-become-supported-by-official-openwrt-releases/103883 ''GL.iNet GL-SF1200 supported ?'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://kknews.cc/digital/yxnznjj.html ''GL.iNet GL-SF1200'' Review on '''KKNews'''] (PCB images) :PCB: GL-SF1200_V1_0 (v1.0), GL-SF1200_V2_2 (v2.2 FCC) <!-- Shanghai SiFlower Microelectronics Co., Ltd. (SiChang Communication ?) :Shanghai SiFlower Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2014, aiming to design Wi-Fi communicate chips. :SiFlower was the first IC design company in mainland China to launch Wi-Fi AP chip SFA1890 in 2018. :Moreover, in October 2020, SiFlower introduced the industry's first integrated dual-band 1200M Wi-Fi AP chip SF19A2890. -->
==Pictures== <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:GL-SF1200 pcb.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==Notes== ===Iperf3 Tests=== *Iperf3 test between Router to PC Gigabit ethernet port (RTL8211DN) :Server: SF1200 iperf3 -s -p 8443 :Client: PC (Gigabit RTL8211DN) iperf3 -u -b 1000M -c 192.168.20.230 -p 8443
[[File:Sf1200 iperf3 Server.jpg|200px]]
*Iperf3 test between LAN1-LAN2 :LAN1: Gigabit ethernet PC iperf3 -s -p 8443 :LAN2: Gigabit ethernet PC iperf3 -u -b 1000M -c 192.168.20.229 -t 30 -p 8443
[[File:Sf1200 iperf3 LAN1 LAN2.jpg|200px]]
==See also== :;[[GL.iNet]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
